actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that U.S. combat troops not be introduced in the Middle East conflict without prior congressional authorization.

summary.text: Declares it to be the sense of the House of Representatives that United States combat troops not be introduced, committed, or involved, in any way or manner, directly or indirectly, in the present armed conflict in the Middle East without prior congressional authorization.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that U.S. combat troops not be introduced in the Middle East conflict without prior congressional authorization.
